title: LF Clash team
body:
G4 top/jg main.
Can fill though.
Wouldn't mind playing a few games before it actually starts!
If you want to make a team hit me up anyway. Dont care who you are, aslong as you arnt toxic and actually want to try üòÅ

replies.body:
We want you to be our top laner!

Add me in-game 'Far' (I'll play on a silver account)
